page.title: Humanitarian response to the 2010 Haiti earthquake

rev.comment: rm iconized decorative logo for World Bank, failing [[WP:NFC]]
rev.diff:
Line 18: Line 18:
"There is no doubt that we are facing a major humanitarian emergency and that a major relief effort will be required," United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon said. The U.N. mobilized an emergency response team to help coordinate humanitarian relief efforts.<ref>[http://edition.cnn.com/2010/WORLD/americas/01/13/haiti.quake.world.reaction/index.html U.N. chief calls on world to help crisis-hit Haiti].</ref>
"There is no doubt that we are facing a major humanitarian emergency and that a major relief effort will be required," United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon said. The U.N. mobilized an emergency response team to help coordinate humanitarian relief efforts.<ref>[http://edition.cnn.com/2010/WORLD/americas/01/13/haiti.quake.world.reaction/index.html U.N. chief calls on world to help crisis-hit Haiti].</ref>
* The [[United Nations Security Council|Security Council]] authorised an increase of 3,500 troops and police of the [[United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti]] in [[United Nations Security Council Resolution 1908|Resolution 1908]].<ref>{{cite news|url=http://www.un.org/apps/news/story.asp?NewsID=33516&Cr=haiti&Cr1=|title=Security Council authorizes 3,500 more UN peacekeepers for Haiti|date=19 January 2010|publisher=UN News Centre}}</ref>
* The [[United Nations Security Council|Security Council]] authorised an increase of 3,500 troops and police of the [[United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti]] in [[United Nations Security Council Resolution 1908|Resolution 1908]].<ref>{{cite news|url=http://www.un.org/apps/news/story.asp?NewsID=33516&Cr=haiti&Cr1=|title=Security Council authorizes 3,500 more UN peacekeepers for Haiti|date=19 January 2010|publisher=UN News Centre}}</ref>
â
* [[File:World Bank Logo.svg|22px]] The [[World Bank]] provided extra funding of $100 million to support recovery and reconstruction in Haiti.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://web.worldbank.org/WBSITE/EXTERNAL/NEWS/0,,contentMDK:22440632~pagePK:64257043~piPK:437376~theSitePK:4607,00.html |title=World Bank to Provide an Additional $100 Million to Haiti, Following Earthquake |publisher=Web.worldbank.org |date= |accessdate=2010-01-13}}</ref>
+
* The [[World Bank]] provided extra funding of $100 million to support recovery and reconstruction in Haiti.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://web.worldbank.org/WBSITE/EXTERNAL/NEWS/0,,contentMDK:22440632~pagePK:64257043~piPK:437376~theSitePK:4607,00.html |title=World Bank to Provide an Additional $100 Million to Haiti, Following Earthquake |publisher=Web.worldbank.org |date= |accessdate=2010-01-13}}</ref>
* [[File:Flag of UNICEF.svg|25px]] [[UNICEF]] made an emergency appeal for assistance to aid the victims.<ref name="UNICEF">[http://www.unicef.org.uk/emergency/emergency_detail.asp?emergency=63 "Haiti Earthquake Children's Appeal"]. Retrieved 13 January 2010.</ref>
* [[File:Flag of UNICEF.svg|25px]] [[UNICEF]] made an emergency appeal for assistance to aid the victims.<ref name="UNICEF">[http://www.unicef.org.uk/emergency/emergency_detail.asp?emergency=63 "Haiti Earthquake Children's Appeal"]. Retrieved 13 January 2010.</ref>
* {{flag|World Health Organization}} - Sent a "12-member team of health and logistics experts."<ref>{{cite web| url=http://www.who.int/mediacentre/news/releases/2010/haiti_earthquake_20100113/en/index.html |title=WHO response in Haiti |accessdate=2010-01-14}}</ref>
* {{flag|World Health Organization}} - Sent a "12-member team of health and logistics experts."<ref>{{cite web| url=http://www.who.int/mediacentre/news/releases/2010/haiti_earthquake_20100113/en/index.html |title=WHO response in Haiti |accessdate=2010-01-14}}</ref>
